posts.title: The Case for "Un-Resolutions": Why Quitting is Better Than Starting
posts.excerpt: Every December, the pressure mounts to add new goals to our already overflowing plates. But real progress requires space, not clutter. Before you commit to more, discover why the smartest move for 2026 is defining your "un-resolutions", and learning what to quit.

posts.title: The Power Of Micro-Habits Transforming Your Life One Small Step At A Time
posts.excerpt: Micro habits are tiny, consistent actions that, over time, lead to profound personal transformation.

posts.title: FATE OR COINCIDENCE?
posts.excerpt:
How does life really work? 

Fate or coincidence, who will live long enough to find out?

posts.title: The Ultimate Digital Teammate: Inside Anduril’s AI-Powered EagleEye Helmet
posts.excerpt: Anduril Industries unveiled EagleEye some months back, a revolutionary modular helmet system that integrates AI, mixed reality, and mission command directly into the soldier's visor.

posts.title: How AI Is Reshaping Everyday Work: Embracing the Future of Collaboration, Not Replacement.
posts.excerpt: A practical look at how AI is transforming everyday work, what skills still matter, and how anyone can adapt without getting overwhelmed.

posts.title: Fixed asset disposal- Sale/Scrap in Microsoft Dynamics 365 Finance and Operations
posts.excerpt: In this blog, I will try explaining the Disposal process with accounting entries in Microsoft Dynamics 365 finance and operations.

posts.title: Productivity Tips to Help Transform Your Daily Routine
posts.excerpt: Discover proven productivity strategies that successful people use to maximize their efficiency, manage time effectively, and achieve more in less time.

posts.excerpt: A brief excerpt of the post

authorProfile.bio: A future-of-work strategist and writer focused on the intersection of human creativity and technological leverage. For the past decade, I have advised companies on implementing digital tools while maintaining employee engagement and focusing on high-value human output. My background includes 5 years in product development, giving me a practical understanding of how AI is reshaping daily workflow. My work Centres on proving that the most valuable skills in the AI era are inherently human:

posts.title: UEFA Champions League Matchday 5 Review
posts.excerpt: This week’s Champions League action delivered big results, surprise performances, and a major shake-up in the group standings. From Arsenal’s statement win to Atalanta’s explosive comeback and Copenhagen’s first victory.

posts.title: State of the Crypto Market - November 22, 2025
posts.excerpt: After a year defined by sharp rallies, sudden reversals, and the growing weight of institutional money, the crypto market is closing out 2025 on uncertain footing. The momentum that carried Bitcoin and Ethereum to new highs has cooled, replaced by choppy price action and a tug-of-war between ETF flows and macro headlines.
